desc: A full service salon and barbershop that is a safe space for everyone! Offering long and short haircuts, colours, beard trims and shaves.

layout.text:
Kitchener-Waterloo’s full-service salon and barbershop. We pride ourselves on being a safe space for everyone — all butts welcome! From short hair to long, from full colour to highlights, from beard trims to shaves: we’ve got you covered.
Click below to schedule your appointment.
